title: List of non-toxic plants for your terrarium
description: Non toxic plants for reptile enclosures..1
cleaned_text: List of non-toxic plants for your terrarium If you liked this article, then LIKE this article here! Common Name / Scientific name - ABELIA (Abelia grandiflora) - AFRICAN VIOLET (Saintpaulia sp.) soleirolii) - BIRD'S NEST FERN (Asplenium nidus) - BOSTON (Nephrolepsis exalta) - BOTTLE - grandiflora) PILEA (Pilea ypoestes sang.) PONYTAIL PLANT (Beaucarnea recurvata) - PRAYER PLANT (Maranta leuconeura) - PASSION: VELVET (Gynura) (Chlorophytum comosum) FERN zebrina) - ZINNIAS (Zinnia be confused with another "creeping charlie," Glecoma heteracea which is toxic ** Not to be confused with another "umbrella" plant, Schefflera actinophylla which is toxic.
